timeline.message:
ci: update mac ci setup

Signed-off-by: Jose Nino <jnino@lyft.com>

timeline.bodyText: Actually this will probably break CI
timeline.author: rebello95
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,30 +0,0 @@
-#!/bin/bash
-
-# Installs the dependencies required for a macOS build.
-
-function is_installed {
-    brew ls --versions "$1" >/dev/null
-}
-
-function install {
-    echo "Installing $1"
-    if ! brew install "$1"
-    then
-        echo "Failed to install $1"
-        exit 1
-    fi
-}
-
-if ! brew update; then
-    echo "Failed to update homebrew"
-    exit 1
-fi
-
-DEPS="automake cmake coreutils go libtool wget ninja gpg bazelbuild/tap/bazelisk"
-for DEP in ${DEPS}
-do
-    is_installed "${DEP}" || install "${DEP}"
-done
-
-# https://github.com/Microsoft/azure-pipelines-image-generation/blob/master/images/macos/macos-10.14-Readme.md#xcode
-sudo xcode-select --switch /Applications/Xcode_11.3.app

replies.bodyText: the 10.15 machines have 11.3.1 and I updated .bazelrc
replies.author: junr03
